text: Mindy Kaling attempted to overcome her jet lag on Monday after landing in London by launching a Twitter Q & A with fans. During the back - and - forth with social media users, the 39 - year - old was asked about motherhood, her best relationship advice, and her daughter Katherine, who will turn one in December. Answering fans, Mindy got candid about her baby girl's upcoming birthday and the nonstop thrill of being a mom. Revealed : Mindy Kaling, 39 ( pictured at the Glamour Women of the Year summit on Sunday ), traveled to London on Monday and experienced jet lag Staying awake : She decided to launch a Twitter Q & A with fans to keep her up after the flight Interesting : During the Q & A, Mindy revealed what it was
